colcon-library-path
===================

an extension for `colcon-core <https://github.com/colcon/colcon-core>`_ to set an environment variable to find shared libraries at runtime.

colcon colcon-library-path
===================

an extension for `colcon-core <https://github.com/colcon/colcon-core>`_ to set an environment variable to find shared libraries at runtime. extension for colcon adding an environment variable to find libraries.
